title: App Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Social Justice-Based Social Work Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three critical frameworks for analyzing power dynamics in social welfare settings.
Learners can design blended learning activities based on social justice pedagogy and apply them to practical contexts.
Learners can propose collaborative problem-solving strategies for social justice issues with peer practitioners using digital platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
